titleStmt.title: To the Kings Most Excellent Maiesty, the humble petition of the Commons of the late Parliament, and others His Majesties loyall subjects in Scotland. Together with His Majesties gracious answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: The loyal subjects refer to the Scottish forces at Durham.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
